replies.msg:
我讀緊comp sci,畢左業好耐啦
在正苦做緊web developer
在課室成日講一推algorithm背後原理
但出黎做野，你識用library 和tools已經夠殺食。業界的it cert，都係重視你識用，同好high level好宏觀咁認多過識佢原理就夠，唔駛你識背後細節原理。
之前報左 microsoft 的online data science和ai堂黎玩，理解下。用library玩好似唔算太難。

replies.msg:
ching, 請問我係BBA (Hon) 讀過computer programming嘅elective同埋啲state 嘅core,請問apply唔apply到？
btw學費多少？

2015 part time mstat graduate 路過
當年我做果份written test:

15條mc, 一條4分，唔做0分，做錯扣1分
integrate from -0.5 to 0.5 (1 over sqrt (1+x^2))

given x^2+x=3, find x^4+7x

find the coefficient of the Taylor series expansion of e^(x^2+2)

lim (n tends to infinity) ([summation x from 1 to n (e^(x/n)] / n) = ?

find the area between x+y=2 and y=x^2 (呢條我覺得佢寫漏左 and x-axis)

given a 2×2 matrix A a11 = 2 a12 = 4 a21 = 1 a22 = 2, if A^6 = kA, what is k?

f(x,y) = x^3 + y^3 + 3xy, given P and Q are two distinct points on the surface, P and Q are (saddle points / local maximum / local minimum)?

f(x) = integrate from 0 to x^2 ( dt / (1+t^3)), f’(2) = ?

given a determinant with all diagonal element = a, all other elements = b, and a-b (定b-a?)as an eigenvalue, find the other eigenvalue

f(x,y) = x^3 – axy – x + 1, find the greatest lower bound (?) of a such that f(x,y) has a local minimum.

consider the following system of linear equation
x+2y+3z=0
x+3y+2z=0
x+2y+bz=0
There exists a b such that the system has only 1 / has no / have more than 1 solution?

given a 2×2 matrix A a11 = 2 a12 = 4 a21 = 1 a22 = 2, if A^6 = kA, what is k?

f(x,y) = x^3 + y^3 + 3xy, given P and Q are two distinct points on the surface, P and Q are (saddle points / local maximum / local minimum)?

f(x) = integrate from 0 to x^2 ( dt / (1+t^3)), f’(2) = ?

given a determinant with all diagonal element = a, all other elements = b, and a-b (定b-a?)as an eigenvalue, find the other eigenvalue

f(x,y) = x^3 – axy – x + 1, find the greatest lower bound (?) of a such that f(x,y) has a local minimum.

consider the following system of linear equation
x+2y+3z=0
x+3y+2z=0
x+2y+bz=0
There exists a b such that the system has only 1 / has no / have more than 1 solution?

replies.msg:
做左幾年ibank it 之後轉出黎起startup打工

當時潮流興big data
同埋讀master我係揀最平/最易讀/最易入/最近番工
我讀既時候只係需要8個course就畢業, project都唔洗做, master黎講最平係佢咁濟
而且我相信要讀既野越fundamental將來既可能性越大

幾句advice比MDASC既同學仔
真係讀溫好d stat先好去上堂
睇佢個syllabus得一個course會同你打好stat底(DASC7011 statistical inference for Data science)
core仲要有一個stat 既advanced course (STAT6014 Advanced statistical learning), 唔熟linear / logistic regression 就肯定收皮

數底麻麻既就唔好take STAT6013/6015/6016
time series / data mining係值得take既
STAT8301 big data analytics 佢開班第一年我就take, 伏到極點, 完全學唔到野

replies.msg:
CU business stat 個curriculum

Students are required to complete a minimum of 8 electives to graduate.
STAT5101 Foundations of Data Science
STAT5102 Regression in Practice
STAT5103 High-dimensional Data Analysis
STAT5104 Data Mining
STAT5105 Applied Survival Data Analysis
STAT6101 Statistics for Management
STAT6102 Stochastic Modelling
STAT6103 Simulations and Statistical Computing
STAT6104 Financial Time Series
STAT6105 Basic Actuarial Principles and their Applications
STAT6106 Applied Bayesian Methods
STAT6107 Selected Topics on Data Science and Business Statistics
STAT6108 Official Statistics and Structural Equation Modelling
RMSC5101 Statistical Methods in Risk Management and Finance
RMSC6001 Interest Rates and Fixed Incomes Risk Management
RMSC6004 Special Topics in Risk Management
RMSC6005 Special Topics in Quantitative Finance

我無讀過CU呢個programme
但係就咁望下course syllabus都數到起碼4/5個fundamental / general stat course
Financial Time Series其實都好general啦
咪又係教你AR/MA/ARIMA

最終都係睇你自己揀咩黎讀, 你揀曬RMSC course讀咁我都無野好講
